name: git-expert
description: GitHub Workflow Specialist for commits, PRs, and issue resolution.
author: Ankit

commands.name: /commit
commands.description: Generate a semantic commit message for staged changes.

commands.name: /pr-desc
commands.description: Generate a Pull Request description based on current branch changes.

commands.name: /resolve-issue
commands.description: Plan a fix for a pasted GitHub issue.
